metadata.description: Enterprise-grade hierarchical multi-agent orchestration system with 74 specialized agents across 18 modular plugins, 20 autonomous workflows, and opt-in plugin loading

plugins.name: database-specialists
plugins.description: Database specialists for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, MongoDB, Cassandra, DynamoDB, Neo4j, and Redis (9 agents)

plugins.name: language-developers
plugins.description: Expert developers for Python, TypeScript, Java, Go, Rust, C#, Swift, Kotlin, Ruby, PHP, and C++ (11 agents)

plugins.name: frontend-frameworks
plugins.description: Frontend framework specialists for React, Next.js, Vue, and Angular (4 agents)

plugins.name: mobile-development
plugins.description: Mobile development specialists for SwiftUI (iOS/macOS) and Jetpack Compose (Android) (2 agents)

plugins.name: game-development
plugins.description: Game engine specialists for Unity, Unreal Engine, and Godot (3 agents)

plugins.name: ai-ml-engineering
plugins.description: AI/ML specialists for LangChain, LlamaIndex, ML engineering, MLOps, and data engineering (5 agents + ML pipeline workflow)

plugins.name: blockchain-web3
plugins.description: Blockchain and Web3 specialists for Solidity smart contracts and dApp development (2 agents)

plugins.name: api-design
plugins.description: API design specialists for GraphQL, gRPC, and OpenAPI/REST (3 agents)

plugins.name: quality-assurance
plugins.description: Quality assurance specialists for code review, testing, debugging, security audits, contract testing, mutation testing, load testing, and E2E testing with Playwright (8 agents + 5 QA workflows)

plugins.name: devops-cloud
plugins.description: DevOps and cloud infrastructure specialists for AWS, Azure, GCP, and Terraform (4 agents + 3 DevOps workflows including CI/CD, deployment, and monitoring)

plugins.name: infrastructure-messaging
plugins.description: Message queue specialists for Apache Kafka and RabbitMQ (2 agents)

plugins.name: infrastructure-search
plugins.description: Search infrastructure specialists for Elasticsearch and Algolia (2 agents)

plugins.name: infrastructure-caching
plugins.description: Caching specialists for Redis and CDN strategies (2 agents)

plugins.name: infrastructure-monitoring
plugins.description: Monitoring and observability specialists for Prometheus/Grafana, ELK Stack, OpenTelemetry, and SRE practices (4 agents)

plugins.name: compliance
plugins.description: Enterprise compliance specialists for FedRAMP, ISO 27001, SOC 2, PCI DSS, and GDPR (5 agents)

plugins.name: orchestration
plugins.description: High-level orchestrators for project and feature coordination (2 opus-powered agents + 7 orchestration workflows including new projects, features, refactoring, bug fixes, legacy modernization, architecture review, and cost optimization)

plugins.name: meta-development
plugins.description: Meta-system agents for creating new agents, workflows, and skills (4 agents + 3 meta workflows)

plugins.name: development-core
plugins.description: Core development agents including system architect and full-stack developer (2 agents)
